pageContext.claim: “That's more money than we'll make in a hundred years if things went perfectly for our country.”
pageContext.analysis: We're not sure what Trump is getting at with this statement. The United States in 2020 had about $3.5 trillion in revenue in a year, so clearly over a 100 years, more than $100 trillion would be raised. Not all if could be dedicated to environmental issues, obviously, but the Green New Deal would not cost $100 trillion anyway. So it's just a stupid comment.
